Typedef Documentation

typedef void*(* KDTree_data_copy_func)(void **dest, void *src)

type of function to copy the data

Parameters:
dest pointer to the new data pointer
src the data pointer in the node to be copyed
Returns:
the new new copyed data NULL on error
note: that unfortunatly strcpy() CAN NOT be used here. you need to allocate memory and then use strcpy()

Definition at line 68 of file KDTree.h.

typedef void(* KDTree_data_free_func)(void *data)

type of a function to pass to the delete functions to free the data

Parameters:
data pointer to the data to be free'ed
Returns:
nothing
note: free() can be used if the data is a simple type

Definition at line 52 of file KDTree.h.

typedef struct KDTree_node_tab KDTree_node

typedef void*(* KDTree_traverse_function)(KDTree *tree, KDTree_node *node, double *point, void *data, void *extra)

type of function to be passed to the traverse function

Parameters:
tree the tree being parsed
node the current node
point the point
data the data the current node holds
extra the extra pointer passed to the traverse function
Returns:
null to continue the traverse loop non null that stops the traverse loop and is returned by the traverse function

function to find the nearest points to a point in a kd tree

Parameters:
tree the tree to delete all the nodes in

Returns:
the number of nodes found

int  converse,
KDTree_traverse_function  func,
void *  extra 
)

function to traverse a kd tree inorder

Parameters:
tree the tree to traverse
converse if true swap left and right
func the function to pass each node to for processing
extra extra data to pass to/from the proccessing function
Returns:
the non null returned from the proccessing function that stops the traversal NULL if the end of the tree was reached
